title: development
text: raison d’étre forks package, pronounced /fɔrks/ …

title: development
text: forks package developed extension formula class base R. vctrs package used extend approach formula handling.

title: development
text: thoughts led development package. base formula class, applies modeling relationship descriptions Expansion formulas groups/lists related formulas Fixed protected roles individual terms (e.g. outcomes, exposures, predictors, mediators, confounders) Customized unprotected roles individual terms (specific individual packages) Operations applies individual terms distribution level data Operations apply overall formula , affecting relationships terms Labels individual terms (e.g. mtcars$cyl ~ "Number Cylinders")

title: development
text: vctrs forms base , key concept idea vector types coercion hierarchy. theory, character class considered enriched term class. turn, term class considered enriched formula class. enriched classes term formula implemented vectors type hierarchy, emergent properties develop ascend.

text: structure package somewhat hierarchical, specific classes generated allow specific functionality higher level.
